name: Paw High Shoes - Runner Patro
description:
"Get ready for the best Paw High Shoes Runner game EVER! This shoe game is fun, this runway is epic, this shoe race is for baddies! The taller your heels are, the easier it will be to escape from the walls. A different obstacle awaits you at each parkour! There are rails on the roof where you have to spread your legs and slide, walls to jump, a stick to balance and a huge podium waiting for you at the end of the road.

Don’t forget! You need to pick as many as high heels on the road so you can walk on the final podium! Walking on the heels will make you feel like a Boy Patrol!
